Odisseo

Introduction

  • Odisseo documentation

Self gravitating system

  • 2 body problem
  • Self gravitating Plummer Sphere

External Potentials

  • Navarro-Frank-White halo potential

gradient

  • Gradient example: \(\nabla_{M_{vir}^{NFW}}\) (time_integration)

odisseo.option_classes#

Module Contents#

Classes#

PlummerParams

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the Plummer profile

NFWParams

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the NFW profile

PointMassParams

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the point mass

MNParams

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the Myamoto Nagai profile

SimulationParams

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the simulation. This parameter do not require recompilation

SimulationConfig

NamedTuple containing the configuration for the simulation. This parameter require recompilation

API#

class odisseo.option_classes.PlummerParams[source]#

Bases: typing.NamedTuple

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the Plummer profile

a: float = 7#
Mtot: float = 1.0#
class odisseo.option_classes.NFWParams[source]#

Bases: typing.NamedTuple

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the NFW profile

Mvir: float = None#
r_s: float = 15.3#
c: float = 10#
d_c: float = None#
class odisseo.option_classes.PointMassParams[source]#

Bases: typing.NamedTuple

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the point mass

M: float = 1.0#
class odisseo.option_classes.MNParams[source]#

Bases: typing.NamedTuple

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the Myamoto Nagai profile

M: float = 65000000000.0#
a: float = 3.0#
b: float = 0.28#
class odisseo.option_classes.SimulationParams[source]#

Bases: typing.NamedTuple

NamedTuple containing the parameters for the simulation. This parameter do not require recompilation

G: float = 1.0#
t_end: float = 1.0#
Plummer_params: odisseo.option_classes.PlummerParams = 'PlummerParams(...)'#
NFW_params: odisseo.option_classes.NFWParams = 'NFWParams(...)'#
PointMass_params: odisseo.option_classes.PointMassParams = 'PointMassParams(...)'#
MN_params: odisseo.option_classes.MNParams = 'MNParams(...)'#
class odisseo.option_classes.SimulationConfig[source]#

Bases: typing.NamedTuple

NamedTuple containing the configuration for the simulation. This parameter require recompilation

N_particles: int = 1000#
dimensions: int = 3#
return_snapshots: bool = False#
num_snapshots: int = 10#
fixed_timestep: bool = True#
num_timesteps: int = 1000#
softening: float = 1e-10#
integrator: int = None#
acceleration_scheme: int = None#
batch_size: int = 10000#
double_map: bool = False#
external_accelerations: tuple = ()#
